posts.html:
# Spring Festival

During the chinese new year holiday, i spent almost all my time with my family. Family-Time means too precious for me to waste. Besides, i also visited some of my friends who are ever grown up with me together。We worked in the different cities now so there is little chance to meet each other in our daily life.

Wish everyone has a better life next year!
